title: Top 16 Best-Selling Metal Albums Of 2016 [News]
text: Top 16 Best-Selling Metal Albums of 2016 1. Metallica; 3. Metallica; 4. Metallica; 5. Metallica; 6. Metallica. UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 11 hours ago 4 An interesting rundown has recently surfaced via Metal Insider , showcasing the top-selling records of the guitar-driven domain in 2016. When it comes to the metal genre, you probably won't be surprised by the fact that Metallica dominated the year. However, you might be surprised by Metallica dominating THIS much. Anyhow, Top 16 best-selling metal albums of 2016, go! Best-selling metal albums of 2016: 1. Metallica - Hardwired... To Self Destruct (Blackened Recordings) - 516,000 copies sold 2. Disturbed - Immortalized (Reprise) - 298,000 copies sold 3. Metallica - Metallica [Black Album] (Blackened Recordings) - 267,500 copies sold 4. Metallica - Master of Puppets (Blackened Recordings) - 163,000 copies sold 5. Metallica - ...And Justice for All (Blackened Recordings) - 155,000 copies sold 6. Metallica - Ride the Lightning (Blackened Recordings) - 153,000 copies sold 7. Megadeth - Dystopia (Tradecraft/uME) - 148,000 copies sold 8. Five Finger Death Punch - Got Your Six (Prospect Park) - 146,500 copies sold 9. Avenged Sevenfold - The Stage (Capitol) - 144,000 copies sold 10. Deftones - Gore (Reprise) - 133,000 copies sold 11. Volbeat - Seal the Deal & Lets Boogie (Republic) - 123,000 copies sold 12. Trans-Siberian Orchestra - The Ghosts of Christmas Eve (Atlantic) - 113,000 copies sold 13. Pierce the Veil - Misadventures (Fearless) - 105,000 copies sold 14. Metallica - Kill 'Em All (Blackened Recordings) - 104,000 copies sold 15. A Day to Remember - Bad Vibrations (ADTR) - 102,000 copies sold 16. Korn - The Serenity of Suffering (Roadrunner) - 100,000 copies sold
